body:
On 2014-01-21 01:25:29 +0000, Vaib said:


You're welcome.


I think once you patch up your install, that will work.

There really isn't much current documentation.  Me, I'd be inclined to
get the current cvs version from radiance-online.org and follow the
instructions in the README, but that's a bit much if you aren't a
software dinosaur like me.  I think one could probably create a Debian
source package without too much trouble, since most of that work is
already done, but I'm not sure of the procedures.

Rob?

Randolph





--
Randolph M. Fritz
subject: [Radiance-general] Regarding Radiance Installation, Qt-based rvu,and Objline issues
